title: CRYSTAL The Original, Safe, Natural Mineral Salt Deodorant
description: Crystal's safe and effective deodorants work up to 24 hours. No gimmicks, no harsh chemicals, no toxins. You're safe, and armed with confidence.
cleaned_text: Works up to 24 Hours Because sometimes so do you. Safe + Effective Because we don't formulate with parabens. Cruelty-Free Because we test on people, not animals. No White Marks Because we care about your clothes, too. BEST SELLERS NEW ARRIVALS Mineral Deodorant Roll-On Lavender & White Tea (3 Pack) Magnesium Enriched Deodorant Lavender + Rosemary Magnesium Enriched Deodorant Coconut + Vanilla Magnesium Enriched Deodorant Cucumber + Mint Magnesium Enriched Deodorant Sea Salt + Sage Magnesium Enriched Deodorant Charcoal + Tea Tree Magnesium Enriched Deodorant Clean + Fresh Magnesium Enriched Deodorant Light + Gentle Underneath It All EFFECTIVE ODOR CONTROL Unlike antiperspirants, CRYSTAL deodorants don't block the pores—allowing the body to function naturally. Odor is controlled and eliminated by natural minerals and other botanically-derived ingredients like Lotus Blossom and Orange Peel Extract. Our Rock Star! Forget everything you think you know about deodorants and get acquainted with this 'hidden gem'. Less is more with this powerhouse odor fighter that contains ONE ingredient—Potassium Mineral Salt—to help prevent body odor, naturally. CAUTION: Contents of this product can lead to
